Literature Review: The impact of measurement error (ME) in agricultural data has significant inferential and behavioral implications, affecting the accuracy and reliability of statistical inferences and policy decisions. This literature review synthesizes findings on the nature and sources of ME, potential remedies, and the behavioral implications of ME in agricultural data.
